issue.title: add option to disable auto fixed-joint lumping in parser_urdf.cc

content.raw: @scpeters thanks for the remainder, sdf issue 38 is definitly a problem for my use case. I have a fix for it, but against which branch I am supposed to open a PR? If the issue is a blocker also for other groups (IHMC) I guess is in everyone's interest to have it included in a minor bug fix release of sdformat.
